stories.text:
Hi,

We're giving away free beta tester accounts for our Twitter CRM/DM management app.

We're building it to help fellow bootstrapped founders find their first customers on Twitter.

Would appreciate you test driving it and let us know if it's useful for you?

All we need are your feedback about the app to help us make it better...

Here's a link to sign up for the beta: https://www.firstx.ai/private-beta

A little more about why we built this:

We know if you're actively networking with a lot of people on Twitter to promote your business or project, your inbox can get confusing pretty quick.

So we built FirstX.

It's designed to help you segment who to follow up with, when to follow up, who said they were interested, or needed a link from you or whatever...

We built one dashboard, where you can find Twitter users to connect with using hashtags, keywords or URLs, and you can send, and group your Twitter DMs without losing track of your contacts...

Again, here's the link to our private beta - and please don't hold back!

https://www.firstx.ai/private-beta
stories.title: Show HN: Roast Our Twitter CRM and DM Management App
